Articles.Content: Hello, I would like it if somebody could make a small, aircraft that can fold up. And if you can maybe make a dropship. Thanks!

Those are not able to fold up... but they're pretty small...

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19210-Stock-RCS-Planes-0-16?p=265518&posted=1#post265518

Have some fun!
Oh I already have these. They are so cool! But I would like folding planes.
you should look up SasquachM's stuff, he has some great folding planes, and they all have demo vids on youtube
